layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutSVGText {text} at (10,10) size 106x12 contains 1 chunk(s)
      LayoutSVGInlineText {#text} at (10,10) size 106x12
        chunk 1 text run 1 at (10.00,20.00) startOffset 0 endOffset 26 width 106.00: "This line should be green."
